footer.description: Specialised dental laboratory · Maxillary orthopaedics · Functional appliances. Murcia, Spain.
footer.copyright: JULAB S.L. Dental Laboratory. All rights reserved.

home.heroTitle: Specialists in maxillary orthopaedics and functional appliances
home.heroSubtitle: Quality technical work, in constant dialogue with the prescribing professional. Rigour and consistency in every device.
home.valor1Text: Every job responds to a technical analysis and a specific need of the prescribing professional.
home.valor2Text: Technique serves function. Function respects biology.
home.valor3Text: Constant professional dialogue with the prescriber and respect for the clinical and legal framework.
home.valor4Text: JULAB S.L. does not replace the healthcare professional nor issue clinical diagnoses.
home.identityP1: JULAB S.L. was born from craft, from well-executed manual work and from the constant evolution of technical knowledge. Our activity is based on a deep understanding of function, structural relationship and biomechanical balance applied to every device we make.
home.identityP2: We work exclusively under clinical prescription. We do not seek volume; we seek consistency and lasting results.
home.ctaTitle: Do you have a case or need a quote?
home.ctaSubtitle: We are in Murcia. Contact us by phone or send your enquiry.

servicios.title: Laboratory services
servicios.subtitle: Work preparation, appliances, prosthetics, implantology, 3D scanning and special services.
servicios.cat2Title: Functional appliances, RNO, removable and fixed
servicios.cat3Title: Partial, complete prosthetics and metal structures
servicios.disclaimer: All work is carried out under clinical prescription. For lead times and conditions, please contact us.

nosotros.title: JULAB S.L.
nosotros.subtitle: Specialised dental laboratory · Maxillary orthopaedics · Functional appliances
nosotros.s1P1: JULAB S.L. is a dental laboratory focused on the technical development of functional, orthopaedic and prosthetic solutions, conceived from knowledge, experience and respect for the biology of the stomatognathic system.
nosotros.s1P2: Our activity is based on a deep understanding of function, structural relationship and biomechanical balance, applied to every device we make. We do not work under industrial or mass-production schemes. Every job responds to a technical analysis and a specific need, defined by the prescribing professional.
nosotros.s1P3: JULAB S.L. was born from craft, from well-executed manual work and from the constant evolution of technical knowledge.
nosotros.valorRespeto: Absolute respect for the clinical and legal framework
nosotros.s3Intro: At JULAB S.L. we understand technique as an extension of knowledge, experience and professional responsibility. All work is carried out under three fundamental principles:
nosotros.s3F1Text: Every device must respond to a real need within the stomatognathic system.
nosotros.s3F2Text: Fit, stability and technical consistency are essential.
nosotros.s3F3Text: We always work under clinical prescription.
nosotros.s3Quote: We do not seek volume. We seek consistency. We do not seek speed. We seek lasting results.
nosotros.s4Text: JULAB S.L. does not replace the healthcare professional nor issue clinical diagnoses.
s5Items: JULAB S.L. acts as a technical laboratory under professional prescription.
It does not perform clinical diagnoses or treatments.
It complies with current health regulations.
It respects data protection and confidentiality.
Professional ethics is a fundamental pillar of daily work.

contacto.subtitle: Request a quote, send your work or ask about lead times. We will respond as soon as possible.
